text: Hussainabad is a village in Kapurthala district of Punjab State, India. It is located from Kapurthala, which is both district and sub-district headquarters of Hussainabad. The village is administrated by a Sarpanch, who is an elected representative. == Demography == According to the report published by Census India in 2011, Hussainabad has total number of 113 houses and population of 594 of which include 321 males and 273 females. Literacy rate of Hussainabad is 77.92%, higher than state average of 75.84%. The population of children under the age of 6 years is 64 which is 10.77% of total population of Hussainabad, and child sex ratio is approximately 939, higher than state average of 846. == Population data == {|class="wikitable sortable" !
